mapper.select: select str.*, (select avg(nvl(score, 0)) from tb_review_study) average from tb_study_recruitment str left outer join tb_review_study rv on str.study_num = rv.study_num order by average desc, str.see_cnt, str.reg_date desc
select str.*, (select avg(nvl(score, 0)) from tb_review_study) average from tb_study_recruitment str left outer join tb_review_study rv on str.study_num = rv.study_num where str.study_num = #{num}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_study_recruitment( num, title, content, email, category_code, address_code, study_num, file_group_code, comment_group_code ) values ( seq_study_recruitment_num.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{email}, #{categoryCode}, #{addressCode}, #{studyNum}, #{fileGroupCode}, #{commentGroupCode} )
